import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { account } from '../appwrite/appwriteConsig' const Chat = () => { const [messages, setMessages] = useState([]) const [userData, setUserData] = useState() useEffect(() => { const getUser = account.get() getUser.then(res => { setUserData(res) }, err => { console.log(err) }) }, []) console.log(userData) return (
{userData && ( <>

Hello {userData.name},

Hello there

How are you?

How are you?

How are you?

)}
) } export default Chat
